DESCRIPTION: Promise Pile is a special pile of #yKaren #yAijou. NL When a card is put into this pile, it is placed at the bottom of the pile by default.
When playing another card, or at the end of the turn, #rexhaust this card.
At the end of the turn, cards with precipitation will be placed in #yPromise #yPile.
Temporary strength will give extra damage to attacks in this turn.
Prevent the next damage you receive.
After playing X times, the card is #rpermanently removed from your #yDeck .
At the end of the battle, drop #y1 #yCard Reward containing only one #yShine Card . NL (The third layer boss is invalid)
Select one or more cards from the target pile and place them in your hand.
After playing, it will no longer be #rremoved from the deck .
Disable the rightmost available relic in this battle. ( #yStar #yCrown will not be disabled)
Improve the effect of tool cards.
The enemy loses strength this turn.
Training will give #yShoot extra damage, and the number of layers will decrease by half every turn.
